description: [Status: stable] [Name: undocumented-warn] [Message: Use of undocumented logging.WARN constant] What it does Checks for uses of logging.WARN. Why is this bad? The logging.WARN constant is an undocumented alias for logging.WARNING. Although itâ€™s not explicitly deprecated, logging.WARN is not mentioned in the logging documentation. Prefer logging.WARNING instead. Example import logging logging.basicConfig(level=logging.WARN) Use instead: import logging logging.basicConfig(level=logging.WARNING)
